text:
!!! GERMANY calling out to HubSpot developers !!!
We are konzepthaus Web Solutions based in Sonthofen, right in the beautiful Alpes in the south of Germany. We are the first German HubSpot Elite Partner and we are growing strongly. We currently have 35 people (amazing nerds) on board and we are looking for further experienced developers.
ANYONE interested to join a young and wild tech team in Germany?
Please get in touch: <mailto:monika.wisser@konzepthaus-ws.de|monika.wisser@konzepthaus-ws.de>
